@DestinLegarie I love the double standard of Playstation fans. Microsoft buys a studio, and ps fans demand that the games MSFT now own must stay on Playstation. Yet when Playstation buys a studio (Insomniac) and locks a game behind exclusivity, they cheer.
@bahree @Microsoft I agree that MSFT is a great place to work. Never envisioned I would work for a place for more than a decade, but it make sense at MSFT.

Microsoft $MSFT is currently -12.0% at $296.03. Earnings due Tues' AH should be good, but the stock is s/t broken with the main market. Support 292s, psy' $250. News of $ATVI acquisition is arguably a mid/long term positive. @petenajarian https://t.co/H4gcYsbrS0

#Microsoft’s ~$69B deal for #Activision has a $3B breakup fee. If antitrust concerns block the deal, $MSFT has to pay the full fee; if $ATVI finds a different purchaser they’ll be entirely on the hook. Per @LiamKillingstad. All eyes are on the #FTC & #DOJ. https://t.co/01t6w4xoQN

-Microsoft Bookshelf
-Microsoft Encarta
-Microsoft Money

Como ves, temas nada relacionados con gaming.
